article_title: EXCLUSIVE: New SC medical database could improve care, reduce costs
article_text: A consortium of S.C. universities and hospital systems has started using a database with medical information on millions of patients statewide that they hope can develop better — and less expensive — treatment plans.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Columbia, SC, health care, data, South Carolina, Palmetto Health, Clemson University, Medical University of South Carolina, University of South Carolina, Greenville Health System
